author: Nicola Agius
title: Braless Holly Willoughby accidentally exposes nipple while jumping in skimpy top on children's TV programme
text:
Braless Holly Willoughby accidentally exposes nipple while jumping in skimpy top on children's TV programme The presenter was left VERY red-faced in this vintage clip of Ministry of Mayhem Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Holly Willoughby accidentally flashed her breast on kids TV. 
In an vintage clip of the This Morning presenter hosting childrenâ€™s show Ministry of Mayhem, the star suffered a humiliating wardrobe malfunction. 
Braless and dressed in a very skimpy top, she was seen dancing around before jumping up and down. 
As she moved around the stage, her boob popped out, exposing her nipple on camera. Holly Willoughby flashes on Kids TV (Photo: ITV) 
Embarassingly, she was in a room packed with children at the time who saw the incident. Read More 
Those tuning in at home across the country also saw the humiliating moment, which left her red-faced. Holly Willoughby flashes on Kids TV (Photo: ITV) 
Lukcily she handled the situation like a pro and carried on with the show. 
But we can't imagine how she must have been feeling inside. Holly Willoughby flashes on Kids TV (Photo: ITV) 
Holly has previously opened up about the wardrobe malfunction and has admitted it is why she "always wear an earthquake-proof braa while on TV now". 
She added: "That was probably my most embarrassing moment on TV." 
Last week, Holly celebrated her 36th birthday with her family. Holly Willoughby flashes on Kids TV (Photo: ITV) 
The usually private mum shared a rare photo of her three daughters Harry, seven, Belle, five, and Chester, two on the morning of her big day on Instagram. 
She captioned it: "Everything I could possibly ever want on my birthday!!!!" Like us on Facebook
